text:
Disha Patani is one gorgeous actress; she looks stunning in whatever she wears. But this time her Diwali outfit has not impressed her fans and rather made them upset. Why? Well, Disha’s latest Diwali picture in a bra has left her fans angry.
Instagram
Disha wore a sports bra which she has been endorsing along with a golden festive lehenga calling it her comfortable Diwali outfit. But her fans are not very impressed with the outfit and expressed their anger over the picture.
One of her followers wrote, "Don’t advertise your bra at least in Diwali.” Another user writes “What kind of nonsense is this. At least don’t wear such clothes in Diwali.” Another user questioned, “Who observes Diwali by wearing such clothes?”
Instagram
Instagram
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Disha who saw all the hate comments chose to disable the comments section but her followers still found a way. They picked up other photos from her Instagram and began commenting about the sports bra-lehenga snap.
Instagram
Well, Disha has the right to wear what she wants during any time of the day and night, We feel she looks gorgeous in whatever she takes up. More power to her and here's hoping these comments don't spoil her festive mood.
title: Disha Patani Gets Massively Trolled For Wearing Bra With Lehenga, Disables Comments Section
